description: A word processor for writing on WebOS, with enhanced formatting &  user-controlled export.  Scratch supports Real Paragraphs, rich text formatting, and features both a *new* find feature and auto-complete.  Every entry is grouped by topic and title, and has a configurable word count.  Your files are stored on the device in an SQL database, and you can send them out via email or by uploading to Google Docs on command.  Import options include an HTML page on your device, a URL from the internet, or an API-based import from Google Docs.
versionNote: Uses SSL to talk to Google, and main screen now has a "Search" option.
